channel.title: Need help with a model
channel.description: okay, so after running my server and went on my client i found out all of the shortbows come up as a sword under me (but they all fire arrows normally and specials work), but if i go on another client with "working" shortbows they show normally as they would on any other server. What should i do so that they show normally on my normal client? I believe this is a model problem, but i am new to editing clients so i am not sure. Help with this problem would be kindly appreciated. Thank you in advance. :)

item.title: Need help with a model
item.dc:creator: @livingpro livingpro
item.description:
@livingpro wrote:

okay, so after running my server and went on my client i found out all of the shortbows come up as a sword under me (but they all fire arrows normally and specials work), but if i go on another client with “working” shortbows they show normally as they would on any other server. What should i do so that they show normally on my normal client? I believe this is a model problem, but i am new to editing clients so i am not sure. Help with this problem would be kindly appreciated. Thank you in advance.

Read full topic
